signals.problem_statement: The customer support team forgets to reply to angry emails from customers, leading to unresolved issues.
signals.customer_ask: A tool that can flag emails where support did not reply or did not reply appropriately.
signals.suggested_solution: Implement a flagging tool to manage email responses.
signals.context: 30 people in customer support, managing over 2000 active construction sites.

signals.problem_statement: The customer lacks a sentiment analysis tool to identify angry customers and adjust responses accordingly.
signals.customer_ask: A sentiment analyzer that can indicate when a customer is angry.
signals.suggested_solution: A tool that analyzes customer emails to determine sentiment and suggest appropriate responses.
signals.context: 30 people in customer support, managing over 2000 active construction sites.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a way to automatically categorize emails by construction site to improve quality management.
signals.customer_ask: A dashboard that shows construction sites and associated emails.
signals.suggested_solution: Automatically tag emails by construction site to facilitate easier tracking and management.
signals.context: 30 people in customer support, managing over 2000 active construction sites.
